get.description: Get achievements with pagination. Results filtered by user role (admin, mahasiswa, lecturer).

post.description: Create a new achievement draft for a student.

get.description: Retrieve full details of an achievement including mongo data.

put.description: Update achievement details. Students can only update if status is 'draft'.

post.description: Upload file attachments for an achievement.

get.description: Get the timeline history of an achievement.

post.description: Reject a submitted achievement with a note.

get.description: Retrieve general system statistics and analytics data.
Retrieve specific analytics report by ID.

post.description: Authenticate user and return access/refresh tokens.
Invalidate refresh token and logout user.
Get a new access token using a valid refresh token from cookies.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all lecturers
Retrieve lecturer profile details by ID
Get list of students advised by a specific lecturer
Retrieve a list of all students profiles
Retrieve detailed student profile by ID
Retrieve list of achievements belonging to a student with pagination

patch.description: Assign or change the academic advisor for a student

post.description: Create a new user with role-specific profile (student/lecturer/admin)

400.description: Bad request - validation error or missing profile data

get.description: Get user details by ID including role-specific profile

put.description: Update user's basic information (username, email, fullname)
Update user role and associated profile data (student/lecturer)

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or role ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
